data.title: Supplemental Health Insurance
data.meta_description: American Income Life provides affordable life insurance and supplemental health benefits to working families in the United States, Canada, and New Zealand. Learn More.
data.text:
$291,561,110

in claims were paid in 2023

by American Income Life.

That includes $266,097,178 in life claims and $25,463,932 in health claims.*

*Based on 2023 financial data
